# CPListImageRowItemElement

**Class**

Abstract superclass for a a row item element object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class CPListImageRowItemElement
```

## Instance Properties

- **image**: The image associated with this element.
- **isEnabled**: A Boolean value indicating whether the list element is enabled.

## Type Properties

- **maximumImageSize**: The expected image size for the image in your @c CPListImageRowItemElement. Images provided will be resized to this size.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Inherited By

- CPListImageRowItemCardElement
- CPListImageRowItemCondensedElement
- CPListImageRowItemGridElement
- CPListImageRowItemImageGridElement
- CPListImageRowItemRowElement

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
